column1:
[{ "skill": "Strategic Thinking, Product Management, Customer-Centric", "reference": "Proven Experience: at least 4 years of experience in product management, with a minimum of 1 year in a leadership role (huge plus if it’s within the SaaS or advertising technology industry)." },
 { "skill": "Team Leadership, Product Management", "reference": "Lead, mentor, and inspire a team of product managers, fostering a culture of user-centricity, collaboration, and continuous improvement (currently you would work directly with three PMs, two designers and one researcher)." },
 { "skill": "Market Research, Product Analytics", "reference": "Stay abreast of industry trends, competitive landscape, and customer feedback to identify opportunities for product improvements and innovation. Defining and track key product metrics." }]

[{"skill": "Leadership, Game Design", "reference": "Head of Slots Product leading a team of game designers, driving conceptualization and design for social casino slots."},
 {"skill": "Collaboration, Innovation", "reference": "Participate in brainstorming sessions with cross-functional teams to enhance game features and engagement strategies."},
 {"skill": "Game Analysis, Strategic Thinking", "reference": "Analyze player feedback, metrics, and industry trends for iterative improvements in game design."}]

[{ "skill": ["Agile Project Management", "Scrum Product Owner Certified"], "reference": "Abgeschlossenes Studium der Wirtschaftsinformatik / Informatik oder vergleichsbare Berufsausbildung oder relevante Erfahrung im agilen Projektmanagement für Softwareentwicklung Zertifizierter Scrum Product Owner mit relevanter Erfahrung im Arbeiten im agilen Set Up" },
 { "skill": ["Scaled Agile Framework", "Leading Multiple Product Teams"], "reference": "Tiefgreifende Kenntnisse des Scaled Agile Frameworks sowie Erfahrung mit der Leitung mehrerer Product Teams" },
 { "skill": ["Jira & Confluence", "Project Management Tools"], "reference": "Verhandlungssichere Deutsch und Englisch Kenntnisse, Zertifizierter Scrum Product Owner mit relevanter Erfahrung im Arbeiten im agilen Set Up" }]

[{ "skill": ["Bachelor's Degree", "3+ years of experience as a Product Owner"], "reference": "Mandatory Skills Description" },
 { "skill": ["Agile methodology (SCRUM)", "6+ years overall IT Experience", "3+ years software for mission-critical products"], "reference": "Mandatory Skills Description" },
 { "skill": ["Product definition", "Customer development", "Feature scoping", "IaaS/SaaS/PaaS/Cloud product experience", "Project management", "Organizational skills", "Adaptability to changing situations", "Communication skills"], "reference": "Mandatory and Nice-to-Have Skills" }]

[{ "skill": ["Product Management", "SaaS Platforms", "Enterprise Customers"], "reference": "5+ years of experience in Product Management, preferably with a focus on SaaS platforms and enterprise customers"},
{ "skill": ["Strong Technical Background", "Developer Personas", "Product Ownership"], "reference": "Strong technical background, demonstrating experience working with developer personas and managing products catered to this audience"},
{ "skill": ["Scrum & Agile-based B2B SaaS Product Management/Ownership Experience", "Independence with Minimal Direction", "Managing Multiple Priorities"], "reference": "Scrum & Agile-based B2B SaaS product management/ownership experience, can work independently with minimal direction and manage multiple, competing priorities simultaneously"}]

[
  { "skill": ["Product Owner", "ILVM development"], "reference": "Als Product Owner gestalten Sie aktiv die Entwicklung und Optimierung unseres internen Tools ILVM (Intelligentes Lieferanten- & Vertragsmanagement) mit." },
  { "skill": ["Business process", "Digitalization"], "reference": "Sie sind der Schlüsselansprechpartner für Geschäftsprozesse und Digitalisierung." },
  { "skill": ["Project management", "Product development"], "reference": "Aufgaben: Verantwortung für die Weiterentwicklung von ILVM in enger Zusammenarbeit mit Stakeholdern und Entwicklerteams. Definition von Produktanforderungen und Steuerung des Projekts von Anfang bis Ende." },
  { "skill": ["Team management", "Stakeholder coordination"], "reference": "Fachliche Steuerung von Teams und/oder externen Dienstleistern. Durchführung von Workshops zur Prozessoptimierung. Enge Zusammenarbeit mit internen und externen Entwicklern sowie Stakeholdern." },
  { "skill": ["Technology monitoring", "Integration"], "reference": "Kontinuierliche Marktbeobachtung und Integration neuer Technologien." },
  { "skill": ["Agile methodologies", "Release management"], "reference": "Enge Zusammenarbeit mit internen und externen Entwicklern sowie Stakeholdern. Koordination von Release-Zyklen und Vermarktung des Tools." }
]

[{ "skill": ["Commercial acumen", "Product management", "Communication skills", "Analytical skills"], "reference": "Clear commercial acumen with a focus on building strategic product revenue. Proficient in product management and commercial ownership. Strong planning, presentation, problem-solving, and analytical skills."},
         { "skill": ["Planning", "Presentation skills", "Problem solving"], "reference": "Effectively communicate relevant data and conclusions to stakeholders."},
         { "skill": ["Accounting market knowledge", "Accounting software experience"], "reference": "In-depth knowledge of the accounting market with a strong background in accounting software."}]

[{ "skill": ["Strategizing", "Presenting ideas", "Product development"], "reference": "Strategizing and presenting ideas to stakeholders. Defining product features according to customer needs."}, { "skill": ["Agile methodology", "Leadership", "Management experience"], "reference": "Minimum 2 years of experience in agile methodology, Leadership and management experience."}, { "skill": ["Analytical mind", "Synthetical mind", "Working knowledge of agile"], "reference": "Analytical and synthetical mind. Working knowledge of agile methodology, techniques, and frameworks, such as Scrum or Kanban."}]

[{ "skill": "Product Operations", "reference": "As a Product Operations Director, you'll play a critical role in supporting and optimizing our product management processes." },
 { "skill": "Customer Feedback Integration", "reference": "Collaborate with Sales Engineers, Technical Account Managers, Customer Success Managers, and Professional Services to integrate customer feedback into product improvements." },
 { "skill": "Product Lifecycle Management", "reference": "Ensure seamless product lifecycle management, track key performance indicators for product performance, and manage partner programs." }]

[{ "skill": ["Product Owner Sustainability", "Carbon Management"], "reference": "The RoleAs a Product Owner Sustainability, you will play a pivotal role in enriching our value proposition and service offerings by introducing innovative solutions to control and reduce carbon emissions." },
        { "skill": ["Lifecycle Assessments", "Product Carbon Footprints"], "reference": "Conduct lifecycle assessments of products and services.Represent and establish sustainability and carbon management within B2X.Stay informed about innovations, funding opportunities, and regulations related to sustainability, PCF, etc." },
        { "skill": ["Collaboration", "Cross-Functional Teams"], "reference": "Collaborate as a subject matter expert with Sales, IT, and Operations to implement sustainability and carbon solutions.Exchange knowledge and actively network within the industry, participating in CSR events." },
        { "skill": ["Ambition", "Work Ethic"], "reference": "The PersonWe are looking for an ambitious individual with the right attitude and work ethic to help us move the business and our sustainability solutions forward." },
        { "skill": ["Sustainability Assessment Methodologies", "Group-Wide Holistic Strategies"], "reference": "Degree focusing on sustainability (university or comparable qualification in environmental or sustainability management).Experience with sustainability assessment methodologies, particularly Company or Product Carbon Footprints.Experience in developing and implementing group-wide, holistic sustainability strategies is advantageous." },
        { "skill": ["Excellent English", "Multicultural Environment"], "reference": "Excellent written and spoken English.Versatile responsibilities influencing crucial decisions at the heart of the company.Multicultural operating environment." }]

[
    { "skill": "Product Owner/Manager experience", "reference": "Experience in a Product Owner or Product Manager role" },
    { "skill": "High-level product analytics knowledge", "reference": "High-level knowledge of product analytics (and experience in applying it)" },
    { "skill": "Public API management expertise", "reference": "Experience in solving problems related to public API management and API Gateways" },
    { "skill": "Stakeholder management and driving initiatives", "reference": "Experience in managing multiple stakeholders and driving company-wide initiatives" },
    { "skill": "Objective setting for engineering teams", "reference": "Experience in setting objectives for the engineering teams" },
    { "skill": "Negotiation and problem-solving skills", "reference": "Ability to listen and hear the other party, to negotiate and build win-win solutions" },
    { "skill": "Excellent communication/presentation skills", "reference": "English proficiency to at least an upper-intermediate level. Excellent communication and presentation skills." }
]
